name: Bishi Bashi Special 2
summary: Bishi Bashi (ビシバシチャンプ Bishi Bashi Chanpu?) is a series of Konami video games for arcades, mobile phones, PlayStation and Windows. All games in the series comprise playing through a wide variety of competitive minigames against other players. The arcade games support 1 to 6 players[1] and the PlayStation game allows 1 to 8 players; the game will provide computer opponents if there are not enough players.
